commit.message: Add instructions for release.

Merge pull request #22 from jehamilton/master

Fixing re flags deprecation warning in python 3.6
Fixing re flags deprecation warning in python 3.6
Prepare a new release.
"Merge pull request #19 from ankostis/preserve_matches\n\nfeat: configurable norm/case-sensitive/slashes preserving matches"

feat(#10): configurable norm/case-sensitive/slashes preserving matches


+ Performance not seem to be affected when measure with cygwin-python-2.
fix(regex): enable lru_cache decorator
"Merge pull request #18 from xoviat/patch-1\n\nglob: allow forwards compatibility"

glob: allow forwards compatibility

this change is simple, but it allows the functions to be called with an additional 'recursive' argument, which allows glob2 to be swapped out with the builtin version on newer python versions.
Update version number.
"Merge pull request #17 from localmed/python35-support\n\nUse map instead of imap on py35"
Update CHANGES for new release.
Use map instead of imap on py35
"Merge pull request #15 from adamchainz/universal_wheels\n\nRelease as a universal wheel"

Release as a universal wheel

By releasing as a [Python wheel](http://pythonwheels.com/) as well as a source distribution, you can speed up end user’s installs. After merging this command, to release you just need to run `python setup.py clean sdist bdist_wheel upload`.
"Merge pull request #13 from benjaminvdb/master\n\nFixed bug causing iglob to coerce iterator to list"
Fixed bug causing iglob to coerce iterator to list
"Merge pull request #9 from scoobadog/master\n\nOptionally return also hidden files and folders"
Add 'desktop.ini' file to .gitignore
Fix argument quotation
Add 'include_hidden' argument to include hidden files and folders

Revert "make fnmatch.translate also support globstar and make * non-greedy. eg"

This reverts commit 0ee1841fd1d669a41f49c7a89f486a35500f16b8.

Remove nosetests dependency.

You can now use other testing frameworks.
Stop using the ./src subdirectory.
"Merge pull request #6 from joolswills/translate_globstar\n\nmake fnmatch.translate also support globstar and make * non-greedy. "

make fnmatch.translate also support globstar and make * non-greedy. eg

before:

pattern="/home/*/cache"

would match

/home/user/cache
/home/user/something/cache
/home/suer/something/something/cache

now:

pattern="/home/*/cache"

would match

/home/user/cache

pattern="/home/**/cache"

would match

/home/user/cache
/home/user/something/cache
/home/suer/something/something/cache

this brings it in line with the other functions in glob2, and although changes the functionality of a single * - makes it
match the behaviour of most shells, and is more intuitive.
Add license file.
Fixed comment typo
Prepare new version.

Bring back 2.6 compatibility.

Also, the compat module had the lru_cache recipe copied in twice.
